product_name: Patagonia Light Flyer Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Built for dedicated runners who remain undaunted by bad training weather, the men's Light Flyer Jacket is the lightest, most breathable weatherproof shell from Patagonia. Innovative GORE-TEX(R) Active fabric offers super-lightweight, highly breathable, wet-weather protection; it's 30% lighter than other GORE-TEX laminates. Bicep zippers guide airflow through always-open (but protected) rear vents. Stand-up collar is lined with lightweight mesh for warmth and softness. Shaped, fold-over cuffs create makeshift mittens to keep your hands toasty. Small waterproof pocket at center back stashes keys, cash and an energy gel. Reflective logos at left chest and center-back neck. Patagonia Light Flyer Jacket for men features a slim fit for reduced wind resistance. Closeout.
short_description: Built for dedicated runners who remain undaunted by bad training weather, the men's Light Flyer Jacket is the lightest, most breathable weatherproof shell from Patagonia.
